review: old yet gold

this game was great when it was release a long time ago the gold edition from steam is buggy like hell you cant finish the boss level boss is missing i contacted their technical support and refused to acknowledge the problem like this is new to them when this has been discussed for more than 2 years on this forum some managed to install an unofficial patch to finish the game it did not work for  me dont buy it unless if you have too much money to spend or never finish your games

1010 a true role model for the genre  both silent storm and silent storm sentinels are amazing games with good graphics although low system requirements and entertaining game play in my opinion silent storm sentinels is the best of the games but the original is a close follow up its currently up for 10 here on steam and i would highly recommend it for this price but it is often for sale at 525  and you wont get any better 3d tactical turnbased roleplayinggame for this price
addictive and beautiful

basically xcom in ww2 but instead of aliens its nazis with futuristic technology really interesting controls again similar to xcom but subtly different for a game with a scii twist it is very historically accurate in some ways and playing the earlymid game feels like ww2

great old game but benighted with a few glitches that seem to be from the steam based version not present in the original cd version on very hard settings it helps to skill up and get better weaponry with many skirmishes

this is a great old school tactical turnbased game set in an alternate version of world war 2 fully destructible levels permanent death for your soldiers sneaky enemy ai and a high difficulty it is a classic  if you love games like xcom and jagged alliance you should give this one a try

i have always loved this game  the individual level of combat is most interesting to me  try it without using the armor  just dont keep any for your squad  or just use one  you may find due to advanced abilities your people are more effective without the armored suits    i recommend this game to every gamer i meet  i have yet to have one person tell me that they didnt love it

this game should have been the benchmark for all turnbased tactics games like the xcom remakes and those that came afterwards it has the best physics in the genre and a solid loot inventory and skill progression system instead we now have 2 actions per turn and full cover half cover or no cover yay welcome to the age of hollow presentation casual dice throwing console port games
great strategy game love the mechanics simple yet very fun
